::Grounded::
Grounded looked to Lynxiz with a blank expression. Even though she
came non-hostile he felt threatened. Adn it was his job for defenses.
He had a plan however.
"Nightlight i believe that the living quaters down the hall to the
left are free." he said calmly.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Hey Jordan, where are Axis, Lokk, and Seekker?
> OOC2: Seeing that Megatron has entered Astroblast, you should
> be firing at Astroblast. =0
>
> --- Astroblast / Switchblade / Menasor / Lynxiz / Rippersnapper ---
>
> Astroblast jets forward, dodging left and right, a green blast flies by
> him and continues toward Tigerhawk, machinegun bullets strafe his
> side, denting his heavy armour. Several laser blasts streak past
> him, one hits his side armour, leaving a smoking groove. Mini
> rockets crash by him and into his top, shaking him and almost
> knocking out of flight. Astroblast swoops down towards Fireblade,
> and meets Switchblade there.
>
> Switchblade smiles, still cloaked. He throws the remains of
> Fireblade into the hatch, then hops in himself. He yells to
> Astroblast, "Hey, 'Blast, we've got another passenger waiting over
> the hill, make sure to get him when you leave."
>
> Astroblast's rear thrusters launch again, as he curves around to
> pick up the last target, Perceptor.
>
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Menasor leaps forward, Prowl's missiles smashing into his virtually
> unmolested chest armour, causing him to hesitate a little.
> Incarcinator's charges land behind him, the explosions throwing up
> dirt and ashes around Menasor's feet. Menasor lunges at Prowl,
> trying to grab him in his large hands.
>
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Rippersnapper ducks under the missiles. He stops right in front of
> Orion. He suddenly leaps forward, at Orion's chest, trying to claw
> him. (Alloran, is Orion as stupid as Rippersnapper? j/k Firing
> missiles that would damage both bots... something that
> Rippersnapper does. =)
>
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Lynxiz laughs at Grounded's words, "I hope that I don't get gunned
> down." She shivers and turns to Nightlight, "Nightlight, you were
> going to show me to my quarters for my stay?"
